items.summary: Fix the issue where the CRM Dashboard does not load on a fresh page load (hard refresh) for an authenticated user. The app must reliably reach the Dashboard after refresh, or show a clear recoverable error state (with retry) instead of getting stuck or rendering blank.

Rephrase the user-facing text related to the dashboard-load failure to be clear, professional English. Update the relevant error/alert copy shown when the profile/dashboard cannot be loaded so it communicates the problem and next step (retry) succinctly.
